explanation.overview: 这两个名词都指'港口'，但在使用地区和功能侧重上有所不同。

details.meaning: 指商业港口，强调货物装卸和船舶停靠的商业功能
details.example: The ship docked at the busy container port.（船只停靠在繁忙的集装箱港口。）

details.meaning: 指天然或人工的避风港，强调为船只提供安全停泊的功能
details.example: The fishing boats returned to the safety of the harbour.（渔船返回安全的港湾。）

life_examples.port: Shanghai is one of the busiest ports in the world.（上海是全球最繁忙的港口之一。）

life_examples.harbour: The storm forced all ships to seek harbour.（暴风雨迫使所有船只寻找避风港。）

common_errors.error: ❌ The cruise ship docked at New York Harbour.
common_errors.correction: ✅ The cruise ship docked at New York Port.（商业港口用port）

common_errors.error: ❌ The small boats took shelter in the fishing port.
common_errors.correction: ✅ The small boats took shelter in the fishing harbour.（避风港用harbour）

mini_test.question: 选择最合适的词：The ___ handles over 10 million containers annually.
哪个词更适合描述'风景如画的渔船停泊处'？
填空：Pearl ___ is a famous natural deep-water harbor in Hawaii.
